alert.note: Alert for Blanco (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:38PM CDT until September 24 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BLANCO COUNTY... At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Johnson City, or 11 miles southwest of Round Mountain, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blanco, Johnson City, Payton, Rocky Creek, and Sandy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
